title: Game Crashing
body:
ok so a few days ago i wanted to play league and the client opened fine and stuff...none of my friends were on so played ARAM and i got into champion select just fine but once the loading screen came up it stayed black and just crashes and now i havent been able to play league sincec anybody know what i can do?
Edit: I just finished reinstalling and it still has the same problem

replies.body: has happened to alot of people, but Riot insists that it is our connections
I'd like to get some more information to find out what's going on.  After you receive the black screen, you mention crashing.  Are you receiving any error messages?

Hi, I have the same problem here during loading the screen turns black and connection issue pops up. 
After trying to reconnect only bugsplat pops up. Sometimes I can rejoin the game after several minutes, when i try to reconnect for multiple times. The symptoms are same - black loading screen (sometimes it flashes with actual loading screen when I tab+alt). 
Sometimes I join the game for a moment (I can hear ambient sounds, announcer etc.), but after that it crashes and bugsplat pops up again. Tried to reinstall client and repeir client. Problem started few days ago when client showed that some players have issue to join games. 
I waited for the patch, but it didn't help.

Just to clarify, I had no connection issues before or after. Only thing I changed was NVIDIA update (ver. 368.81)

EDIT: Nevermind, I reinstalled graphic drivers and repaired client again and the problem seems to be gone.

ye it gives me an error message that says " Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game." and ive checked it and attempted to reconnect multiple times.

Thanks for the information!  A black screen like the one you mention is usually due to a network issue failing to connect to your game server.  The error message further proves this may be the case.  As a first step, please look over the instructions in our [connections ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)issues guide to resolve this.  I also recommend testing this out in a custom game to avoid any problems.  Let me know if you have any issues after!
